_header: Dread God and all thing shall dread you
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 368.

BodTan407.First Lines:
Drede god and alle thyng schal drede ȝowLoue that lord and no
                    thyng schal nede ȝow…
BodTan407.Last Lines:
…Remembyr ȝour deth and thynk on cristis passionAnd
                    thanne schal ȝe ouer come þe devyll temptacion
